channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Ranger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Ranger

item.title: CVE-2017-7676|2024-08-05T16:12:27.762Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ranger
item.description: Policy resource matcher in Apache Ranger before 0.7.1 ignores characters after '*' wildcard character - like my*test, test*.txt. This can result in unintended behavior.

item.title: CVE-2018-11778|2024-08-05T08:17:09.211Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ranger
item.description: UnixAuthenticationService in Apache Ranger 1.2.0 was updated to correctly handle user input to avoid Stack-based buffer overflow. Versions prior to 1.2.0 should be upgraded to 1.2.0

item.title: CVE-2017-7677|2024-08-05T16:12:27.880Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ranger
item.description: In environments that use external location for hive tables, Hive Authorizer in Apache Ranger before 0.7.1 should be checking RWX permission for create table.
